description: Time-of-day volume multipliers for baseline calibration
methodology: Industry-standard U-shaped intraday volume pattern. Open/close have highest activity, midday lull is lowest.

notes.09:30-10:00: Market open - highest activity, gap fills, overnight order execution
notes.11:00-14:00: Midday lull - lunch hours, lowest activity
notes.15:30-16:00: Close approach - second highest, hedging, rebalancing

usage.example: AAPL daily volume 100000, 09:30 bucket = (100000/390)*30*3.0 = 23077 contracts expected

calibration_plan.refinement: After 30 days of intraday data collection, recalibrate using actual bucket distributions
